QuestData.Title: Satyrical Offerings
QuestData.Description: You find it most amusing to think that this ancient relic is bestowing upon you a blessing meant for your enemies.$b$bYou determine to make as much as you can of this unintentional gift.
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to collect 10 pieces of Satyr Flesh from the various Satyrs in Sargeron, and place them on Elune's Brazier.
QuestData.RewardText: The divine brazier indiscriminately endows you with a blessing.
